group_1.narration: To save the lady's store, we'll find the truck!@We're enthusiastic about it,@but how are we going to find the truck?@That's our current conversation.
According to her,@each truck has its own route,@and one truck goes to many stores.
So the truck that was@supposed to stop at this new store@seemed to be stopping by the store@just before it for its delivery.

group_1.textLeft: I see...then let's head to the last store@the truck was stopping at.
This way.
(The station...so we're going by train.)

group_1.textRight: (We're getting off after only one station?@Are we transferring?)

group_1.textLeft: We've arrived!!

group_1.textRight: Woahâ€”@I didn't know it was so close.

group_1.textLeft: *Chuckle*... There's about 30 CoCoIchi stores in@Kamihama.

group_1.textRight: Heeh, that's amazing.
I had no idea 'cause we never eat out.

group_1.textLeft: That's not important...@Excuse me.

group_1.textRight: W-what is it?@It's not opening time yet...

group_1.textLeft: I would like to ask you about the delivery truck@that was said to be here this morning.

group_1.textRight: The truck? Ahh, you heard from the@new store in Shinsei Ward?

group_1.narration: It seems the employee here@was also told the truck is missing.
But the employee gave the impression that@the truck and its driver would be running like normal.
If he's positive he's not mistaken...

group_1.textLeft: I wonder if the driver received a Witch's Kiss after@leaving this store...
Assuming this was the work of a Witch, of course.

group_1.textRight: And if this was caused by a Magical Girl,@nothing went wrong up until this point...
Then it's unlikely they were brainwashed@beforehand!

group_1.textLeft: That's true.
It's more likely they were physically attacked@beyond this point.

group_1.textRight: I don't sense any magic from this store, so I'm sure@you're right!
But after all this we don't know anythin'.

group_1.textLeft: It's good to understand that@we don't know anything.
But yes, it's true staying here won't accomplish@anything.
Let's go somewhere else.

group_1.textRight: Thank you for your time, Mister.

group_1.textLeft: Ahh, wait a tick.@If it's fine with you...
Here, take this. Maybe it's just a drop of water@on a hot rock, but...

group_1.textRight: This is...? Toppings?!@And curry roux...

group_1.textLeft: That's what they're missing, right?
I can only lend a portion, but that should make up@for the loss.
When someone's in trouble,@we look after each other.

group_1.textRight: Right!@Thank you so much!

group_1.textLeft: THAT'S IT!!
Now for the regular Lucky Topping Corner!
We will be introducing various CoCoIchi toppings@here every time.
And after that, we will announce the lucky forecast@of the day!

group_1.textRight: A brilliant plan.

group_1.textLeft: Today we've invited a guest.@Come on over, Alina Gray!

group_1.textRight: The hell is this?@Alina's mood is molto terribile here!

group_1.textLeft: All of a sudden our guest isn't helping.

group_1.textRight: This isn't free, ya know.@If you have no need, then I, Alina, am going home.

group_1.textLeft: Ahh, p-please wait!
If you answer the question I'll treat you@to one CoCoIchi dish.

group_1.textRight: ...That's fine, however.

group_1.textLeft: Thank you very much!
Okay then, Alina, do you have an absolute favorite@topping?!

group_1.textRight: What a stupida question...
Obviously, that is the Adult's Spicy Curry:@The Chicken Veggie.
The colorful looks, the spicy taste...
It's so eccitante, it gives Alina amazing shivers,@ya know.
That is what is befitting of an artist like Alina.

group_1.textLeft: You're good...
Alina Gray, if we had met at a different place and@time, we may have had a different relationship...
And now the fortune!@If you eat the chicken veggie today...
You might be able to join a team that has decent@scheduling and lets you go straight home after work!

group_1.textRight: Highly self-aware adults,@make your way to CoCoIchi!

group_1.textLeft: Up next is the Login Bonus Corner!
